snippet: It would be better if Americans took a lesson from the South Koreans in the face of threats from North Korea: calm indifference.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Prof Andrei Lankov urges Americans to take lesson from South Koreans' calm indifference in face of threats from North Korea; points out, if history is any guide, North Korea's fake belligerence should not be taken at face value, because things will soon calm down.
lead_paragraph: It would be better if Americans took a lesson from the South Koreans in the face of threats from North Korea: calm indifference.

headline.main: Stay Cool. Call North Korea’s Bluff.
headline.print_headline: Stay Cool. Call North Korea’s Bluff.
